dict.acceptation: 最重要的；主要的；资本的；本金的；
首长，负责人；主要演员，主角；[法]委托人，当事人；本金；

sent.orig: Different theories about the principal quality of indirect principal determine indirect principal has different existence types.
sent.trans: 不同的关于间接正犯的正犯性理论，决定着间接正犯的存在范围与类型。

sent.orig: The stop of action limitation extend to principal, for interests is born on the principal naturally.
sent.trans: 利息诉讼时效的中断，自然及于本金，因为利息是依附本金而生的孳息。

sent.orig: The principal and the vice-principal of the college both attended the meeting.
sent.trans: 学院的正副院长均出席了会议。

sent.orig: We would like to open an account with you as principal to principal.
sent.trans: 我们愿意与你方直接开立帐户。

sent.orig: Mortgage Affordability to quickly find unknown values of Time, Principal or Principal + Interest payment.
sent.trans: 按揭贷款的负担能力，以快速查找未知的价值观的时间，校长或校长+利息支付。
